lead_paragraph: The FIFA Ethics Committee's investigatory chamber on Friday called for former Honduran soccer head Alfredo Hawit Banegas to be banned from soccer for life for allegedly taking illegal payments from sports marketing firms.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Chamber Recommends Lifetime Soccer Ban for Ex-VP Hawit
headline.main: FIFA Chamber Recommends Lifetime Soccer Ban for Ex-VP Hawit

snippet: The FIFA Ethics Committee's investigatory chamber on Friday called for former Honduran soccer head Alfredo Hawit Banegas to be banned from soccer for life for allegedly taking illegal payments from sports marketing firms....
